archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.physloc: Most material is in off-site storage and requires 2-3 days notice for retrieval. Please contact Special Collections for further information.
did.physdesc: 76 boxes plus ledgers; c.130 li. ft.
did.abstract: Materials include correspondence, ledgers, production records, employee records, and other items documenting the history of the town and plant.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Fries Textile Plant Records must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Fries Textile Plant Records, Ms1989-039, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Fries Textile Plant Records were deposited with Special Collections in 1989.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Fries Textile Plant Records commenced in 1989. The collection is partially processed and inventoried.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Colonel Francis Henry Fries founded the town of Fries, Virginia. In 1903, he founded the textile plant in Grayson County. The plant was operated successively by Washington Mills, the Rigel Textile Company, and the Mount Vernon Corporation. It closed in 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials include correspondence, ledgers, production records, employee records, and other items documenting the history of the town and plant.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.

did.unittitle: Inventory, March, June, September, and December 1925.
